title: Breathing In Autumn
description: Jordan McKenzie is broken. He doesn't want to be saved. Autumn is invisible- a social pariah. She doesn't mind. It is safe. Both have secrets that have tied them to their fates. When their worlds collide in the small town of Charlotte, they are forced together for coaching in school. She is a nerd, not at all his type. But then why does he feel attracted to her? She makes him re-evaluate everything, right to the basic thing he always took for granted. And all he can think is that she is too good for him. For Autumn, he is confusing. But she knows there is more to him that meets the eye. She is scared he will leave her like the others once he knows her secret. Is love enough to forget a traumatic past? Or will the past catch up and destroy their new found happiness?THIS IS A STANDALONE NOVE
author: Ava Deniz
